overview:
WebSite devoted to entertainment and information focused primarily in Latin America, and them other Spanish-speaking countries.

Account services Videos Online, text messaging, forums, Chat, help urban (places of interest, routes, information, etc) and a powerful classifieds market free for whom you want to publish something.

This site donate all their income to entities of good public and entrego. Works directly with many establishments where food is given to people with low or no resources.

It is a personal non-profit organization.
